title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: 3D Content Representation and Rendering Techniques in 6G Networks

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: The principles of 3D content representation technologies (NeRF and 3D-GS) in 6G networks can be explained
Distributed learning (federated learning) processes for large-scale 3D scene reconstruction in wireless networks can be designed
Real-time 3D rendering systems using edge computing can be implemented via PBL and performance-evaluated
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
